forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 45. West wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the day unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, the city greets you with a gentle embrace of partly sunny skies, the buttery light illuminating the streets and casting playful shadows. The air carries a crispness, hinting at the chill that wraps around your shoulders, with temperatures gracefully falling throughout the day. It’s a scene of transition, where the eye may catch glimpses of the distant Golden Gate Bridge, its span still partly ensconced by a delicate veil of fog far from shore, whispering the secrets of the bay.

Tonight, the clouds will draw closer, enveloping the city in a soft blanket as the temperatures dip into the realms of coolness. Dressed in layered attire—a comfortable sweater, perhaps, accompanied by an unassuming jacket—will serve you well against the gentle west winds. Engage in a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, or find solace in a cozy nook of a local café, watching as the day mellows into evening. It's this meditative interplay of light and shadow, of warmth and coolness, that nourishes the city’s spirit, inviting reflection and connection on this tranquil January day.
